des: "Ok, this is mostly about the crisp top! I could never get this quite right till I called my mom and wrote it down. It is sweet, nice, and crisp. Serve with French vanilla ice cream."
ins: Combine brown sugar, flour, cinnamon, salt, and cardamom in a large bowl. Cut in butter until blended and the mixture resembles small peas. Mix in oats with a wooden spoon.
